name: [LD46] Alien Rescue
description:
How To Play
AWDS to Steer. SPACE/Fire1 to Revice Alien.

Goal
Let the Alien get as far as possible from crash site. Revive it when it dies, but don't drag your feet. Don't get killed!

More Info:
I made this game in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 46. I used Unity, Blender for 3D assets and Presonus Studio One for Music.
